Name: Acquaviva
Description: One of the nine municipalities of San Marino, known for its medieval history and scenic views.

Name: Chiesanuova
Description: A municipality located in the northern part of San Marino, offering rural charm and historical significance.

Name: Domagnano
Description: A municipality known for its countryside landscape and traditional culture.

Name: Faetano
Description: A small municipality in the southern part of San Marino, with a historical connection to early settlements.

Name: Fiorentino
Description: Known for its charming countryside and medieval fortifications.

Name: Montegiardino
Description: A small municipality with a rich historical background and picturesque surroundings.

Name: San Marino
Description: The capital municipality of San Marino, housing the government and cultural landmarks.

Name: Serravalle
Description: The largest municipality of San Marino, known for its modern urbanization and industrial zone.

Name: Borgo Maggiore
Description: One of the main municipalities, known for its historical landmarks and proximity to Mount Titano.
